images.copyright: Milky Way over Acadia National Park, Maine (© Harry Collins/Getty Images)
images.title: Starry, starry night
images.caption: National Public Lands Day
images.desc: This striking photo lets us showcase two noteworthy events in one day, at no extra charge. (You're welcome.) National Public Lands Day is observed on the fourth Saturday in September, and today's also part of the Acadia Night Sky Festival, which celebrates the starlit skies over Maine's gem of a national park.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
